title: Update a Trucking Company's Information
description: A trucking company calls to update their insurance information on file with the port.

tasks.description: Identify the trucking company in the port's system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Gate admin finds the record for 'Speedy Logistics'.

tasks.description: Receive the new certificate of insurance from the company via email.
tasks.expected_outcome: The admin receives the new document.

tasks.description: Upload the new certificate to their profile and update the policy expiration date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new document is saved in the system, and the company's profile is updated, ensuring their access to the port remains active.
